abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on Salah Youssef, who ran a prostitution ring in Gravesend, Brooklyn; acquitted of charges that he hired hit-man to murder rival pimp, Youssef remains in jail awaiting sentencing on sex trafficking charge.
snippet: Salah Youssef was in love with Nelly, but he thought she was having an affair with Boris, and then things got very complicated.
lead_paragraph: Salah Youssef was in love with Nelly, but he thought she was having an affair with Boris, and then things got very complicated.

headline.main: What’s a Love-Struck Pimp to Do?
headline.print_headline: What’s a Love-Struck Pimp to Do?
headline.seo: From Love-Struck Pimp to Murder-for-Hire Defendant
